text: Ishaan Khatter is an Indian actor. He made his first screen appearance as a child in the 2005 film Vaah! Life Ho Toh Aisi!, which starred his half-brother Shahid Kapoor. His first commercial success came with the romantic drama Dhadak (2018), and he has since starred in the British miniseries A Suitable Boy (2020). == Early life and background == Khatter is the son of actors Neelima Azeem and Rajesh Khattar. His half-brother, Shahid Kapoor, is Azeem's son from her first marriage to actor Pankaj Kapur.Ishan Khattar dances just like big brother Shahid Kapoor in video. Check it out , Hindustan Times, 7 Nov 2017.Rajesh Khattar REACTS To Nepotism Allegations On Son Ishaan , India.com, 18 Nov 2017. He was educated at Jamnabai Narsee School and Billabong High International School, Juhu in Mumbai. He also studied dance at Shiamak Davar's academy. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Indian actors
title: Ishaan Khatter
